AzureBlade takes a grim tone of voice.

AzureBlade: Before I came in the battle with the Decepticons, I sensed 
what seemed to be a maximal in predacon territory. I went there and my 
fears were confirmed. Shiva, the predacon leader, told me there were 
no maximal in his base, yet I did sense the presence fail and become a 
predacon one. I think the maximal was reprogrammed.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> He listened with intrest.
> "Please go on..."
